dict.string: Get List of KM Macro Names Filtered By Macro Group and Macro Name [Example]

Enter Data To Filter the List of Macro Names
MacroGroupName: Full Name of Macro Group MacroNameContains: Any Characters in Macro Name
All comparisons are case insensitive. .
